channel.title: Ah, er, how many versions of HL for pc?
channel.description:
So, yeah, I reinstalled half life a few days ago ( Found it in one of my old cd's :stuck_out_tongue: ) and, I don't know which version im playing, the orignal, the remake? The source version? :S :S
What confuses me the most is the weapons models! They're so different from what I remember O_o the shotgun is different, the mp-5 is different, the granade, the glock, even the granade is diff....and the game doesn't look like it has source graphics...so wtf im playing? :S
The mp-5 is so ugly, I want the one I remember (this is the one I want : [img]https://images.wiki.wegame.com/i/av0J44Bz.jpg[/img] )
example : ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
Yeah I could google but, I totally rather a Home-made explanation =P

item.title: Ah, er, how many versions of HL for pc?
item.dc:creator: Andy0101
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

I don’t know how the fuck you managed to play it HD with the mp5, but yeah, it’s probably HD.

It’s not MP5, it’s M4. :meh: Read the posts above you.

Read full topic

item.title: Ah, er, how many versions of HL for pc?
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
awsgames:

Plug the game’s CD code into Steam and you get the most up-to-date version.

THIS

my freind who doesnt use steam lent me his generation set, so, being the bastard of a freind i am, shoved his keys into my steam and vwola!

Then i told him and he didnt give a shit.
